content: @oadaeh (Jason Flatt) - Should we just post session counts here?
Sure.
Currently have 12people in the Paragraphs session
I'm not entirely sure how many were in my session. I only have a count of 6, but I thought there were 8 at one point. It's hard to keep track of that and lead a conversation.
We currently have 5 people in the video tutorials session
12 in Civi
I have a total of 14 people who have been in the Civi conversation, but maybe not all at once.
12 people currently in Nate's core dev. session.
@BWPanda the upgrade session is in breakout room 1, if you were looking for that.
All the rooms seem empty except 1
I.e. no one in 2, 3, 4
They are.
Where's Opera then?
We decided to have the second session in the main room, because there was no on to be the host.
OK, worked out how to get back to main room...
Not obvious
The ADA compliance session had 4 people
The impromptu German-speaking session had 3 people
I cannot recall how many of us were in the forum discussion ...do you @docwilmot ?
I have a spreadsheet with most of the session count data. Where can I put it so that the people who might care about such things can access it?

@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) I suggested that we add the numbers in the first column in https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1o4Tg318BS4gMoFZ8gyisplRBYLkJhGOW06pew4qBDiw/edit#gid=0

Backdrop LIVE Schedule
Sheet1 Join Zoom now: <a href="http://bit.ly/backdrop-live">http://bit.ly/backdrop-live</a> then join Zoom Breakout Room,Short link to this document: <a href="http://bit.ly/3e5zfrN">http://bit.ly/3e5zfrN</a>,<a href="https://events.backdropcms.org/">Register for Backdrop LIVE</a> Add your own to...
...next to each session of course.

I don't just have numbers. I have who attended which session. So I could just add the totals to that spreadsheet, but I can also say which session was most attended, who attended the most sessions, etc.

I added the room/slot counts to a new worksheet labeled Counts in the spreadsheet, and then I linked to the slot totals from the main worksheet (which I renamed Schedule).
I think it would not be appropriate to have anything which could uniquely identify anybody in a public document w/o approval, and there are at least a couple of people who I'm not sure I could locate to ask, so I left that information out.
